bioAsHtml: Founder @ Start it @kbc, mentor, matchmaker and detector of opportunities. I have an architectural background. Founded some companies before starting @KBC where I got involved in lots of innovative projects. 2 years ago I founded Start it with my eternal partner in crime Katrien. Start it is a free program where we offer space, an enormous network, coaching, an academy and lots of events to early stage, innovative and scalable startups. I’m passionate about my family, work, contemporary art, comics and Blade Runner.
bio:
Founder @ Start it @kbc, mentor, matchmaker and detector of opportunities.
I have an architectural background. Founded some companies before starting @KBC where I got involved in lots of innovative projects. 2 years ago I founded Start it with my eternal partner in crime Katrien. Start it is a free program where we offer space, an enormous network, coaching, an academy and lots of events to early stage, innovative and scalable startups.
I’m passionate about my family, work, contemporary art, comics and Blade Runner.
